tgK0FAmv2g73JWsY1.name: Long-Range Smell
tgK0FAmv2g73JWsY1.notes: Allows you to use the Long-Distance range penalties for Smell rolls.

t2HZpxc_oP9VgTgsM.name: Musical Voice
t2HZpxc_oP9VgTgsM.notes: +1 to reaction rolls after you speak for an extended period (at least a minute in regular conversation), or after a successful performance using Performance, Public Speaking, Singing, etc.

t0kpceg9DHXpHHqrp.name: Occult Exorcist
t0kpceg9DHXpHHqrp.notes: Allows you to ignore the requirement of having Blessed, Power Investiture, or True Faith to avoid the -4 to rolls for Exorcism, but requires you to succeed on an Occultism or Hidden Lore roll to identify what sort of spirit you’re dealing with. Those with Blessed, Power Investiture, or True Faith can spend that point elsewhere.

tqjwlMo3RcDRnpX8o.name: On the Bounce
tqjwlMo3RcDRnpX8o.notes: You can ignore up to -1/level in bulk when firing weapons while jumping when operating a battlesuit, minimum of -1.

t6iEWa-oZ_pmt3PH-.name: Political Doublespeak
t6iEWa-oZ_pmt3PH-.notes: Lets you use Politics as an Influence Skill.

taRgAMv4PC-iakANq.name: Seasoned Spacer
taRgAMv4PC-iakANq.notes: +1 on all DX, HT, Free Fall, Piloting, Spacer, and Vacc Suit rolls to resist personal (not vehicular) disasters aboard ship.

t4Dm4Z2TAm5OJPKvx.name: Starry Eyes
t4Dm4Z2TAm5OJPKvx.notes: Can use Performance as an Influence skill on anyone who has seen your work.

m9hRpZBlJDF0fkRjI.name: Reaction Bonus
m9hRpZBlJDF0fkRjI.notes: People who have read your work

tk7rp-gkjIWfqADuc.name: Understanding Educator
tk7rp-gkjIWfqADuc.notes: When you successfully use your Empathy advantage, add +3 to your Teaching rolls (+1 for Sensitive).
